data.title: Excitement Express
data.statement:
Welcome aboard the Excitement Express! You're the conductor of this journey through punctuation land. Your task is guide sentences to uppercase glory.

Given a string [[s]], boost its exclamations by <<capitalising>> all the letters contained in the exclamations to uppercase. The passengers are eager to go, so be swift!

An exclamation is found like this:
1. It must end with an <<exclamation mark>> {{!}}.
2. Once you find an {{!}}, move backwards through [[s]] and look for:
(a) a <<white-space>> character or a group of consecutive <<white-space>> characters not adjacent to the {{!}}, or
(b) another {{!}}, or
(c) the beginning of the line,
whichever appears the closest to the {{!}} in step 1.
3. Any characters between the feature found in step 2 and the {{!}} in step 1 is an exclamation. <<The exclamation may or may not contain any letters and/or white-space characters.>>

Can you navigate grammar's twists to ensure every sentence shines? Hop on the Excitement Express and test your punctuation prowess!

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Welcome aboard the Excitement Express! You're the conductor of this journey through punctuation land. Your task is guide sentences to uppercase glory.

Given a string s, boost its exclamations by capitalising all the letters contained in the exclamations to uppercase. The passengers are eager to go, so be swift!

An exclamation is found like this:
1. It must end with an exclamation mark !.
2. Once you find an !, move backwards through s and look for:
(a) a white-space character or a group of consecutive white-space characters not adjacent to the !, or
(b) another !, or
(c) the beginning of the line,
whichever appears the closest to the ! in step 1.
3. Any characters between the feature found in step 2 and the ! in step 1 is an exclamation. The exclamation may or may not contain any letters and/or white-space characters.

Can you navigate grammar's twists to ensure every sentence shines? Hop on the Excitement Express and test your punctuation prowess!
Input
Line 1 Number n an amount of sentences
Next n lines Sentence s
Output
n lines a sentence for your passengers for each of the n lines
Constraints
1 ≤ n ≤ 10
1 ≤ Length of s ≤ 256
Example
Input
1
Hello everyone! Welcome to Excitement Express!
Output
Hello EVERYONE! Welcome to Excitement EXPRESS!
